DOC.HEADLINE: SOUTHERN SECTION FOOTBALL ROUNDUP ; MISSION LEAGUE
DOC.TEXT: St . Francis 21 , Serra 12 -- Running back Darin Maxwell rushed for 93 yards and a touchdown and quarterback Brian Rucker passed for two touchdowns for St . Francis ( 4-2-1 , 1-1 ) at Serra . St . Francis forced four turnovers , two of which led to touchdowns . Maxwell opened the scoring with a one-yard run in the second quarter and the Golden Knights took a 14-0 halftime lead_on a one-yard touchdown pass from Rucker to wide receiver Chris Ross . Ross caught four passes for 36 yards and Rucker completed seven of 12 for 103 yards . St . Francis took a 21-0 lead early in the third quarter but Serra ( 4-3 , 0-2 ) came_back on touchdowns passes of eight and 13 yards by quarterback DeWayne Hervey , who was eight of 20 for 140 yards . KEVIN BOLT
